name: Name
contactdescription: Fill out the form to submit contact info - this is example use of form and styling it
getstartedmessage: To get started use the menu to navigate and change languages
aboutdescription: This app was created to provide an example reference implementation to bootstrap and accelerate Vue JS projects and to explore using various client side libraries to compose a rich user experience.
technologydescription: This application was built using the following technologies:
vuejsdescription: Vue is a progressive javascript framework that enables creating interactive UIs using encapsulated components that manage their own state.
vuetifylibrarydescription: Visually appealing Vue components that implement Google's Material Design along with layout and theming support.
vueclinamedescription: Quickly get started building Vue Apps using toolset that allows you to focus on development.
notificationsdescription: Below are examples of 'toast' style notifications
modalsdescription: Below are examples of modal dialogs
authenticatedcontentdescription: Here is content displayed only if user is signed in
serviceexampledescription: Example of use of services and HttpClient
formsexampledescription: Example of use of forms and validation
